pithara widyalaya athara tharagaya nalanda widyala palamu inima - panduwara 85.2 kadi siyalu dena dawi lakunu 241 ( lakshitha rasanjana 78, dilhara polgampala 26, janith kaldera 23, rawin da silwa 22, santhus gunathilaka 10/3, shiwan perera 26/2 ) shantha pithara widyala palamu inima - panduwara 99.4 kadi siyalu dena dawi lakunu 302 ( bhanuka da silwa 80, santhush gunathilaka 79, shiwan perera nodawi 69, rawinda silwa 75/6 ) shantha pithara widyalayata palamu inime jayak hi mi wiya.
